title: Coocaa 127 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Google Assistant, HDR 10 and Dolby Audio  (50S6G Pro)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV, 1N Wall Mount, 1N Remote, 2N Batteries, 1N Base Stand Installation, 2N Base Stands, 4N Screws, 1N Quick start guide,1N Warranty Card
product_specification.Picture Engine: Trochilus Extreme, Hightech AI Quad Core Processor
product_specification.Other Video Features: 4K Streaming, HDR 10 Plus, High Dynamic Contrast, Vivid Color, Movies Support in USB Mode, Auto Backlight Scan, Smooth Motion Rate, Digital Noise Reduction
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Music, Movie, News, Sports, User
product_specification.Other Audio Features: Automatic Volume Level (AVL), Digital Media Player (DMP) Content: Music, Music Alone Mode, Noise Reduction 3D, Sport Mode, Total Surround, Audio Equalizer
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Prime Video, Sony Liv, Zee5, Jio Cinema
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Android 10.0 AI Smart OS, RJ45 Port, Dual Band WiFi, Play Store, Google Eco System, Voice Search
product_specification.Stand Type: Wall Mount Stand and Table Top Stand
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused due to Tampering of the Product by An Unauthorised Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.4K Resolution: It features a bright IPS panel. It even comes with 4K resolution. So, the displayed 4K images will look crystal-clear, sharp, and vivid.

review:
coocaa 43s6g pro my frist tv is screen problems .
but Flipkart is Replace new tv...this tv picture quality is very good ,
sound is average .but good .. hol , room.... clear sound quality.
casting speed is something minor low but Wi-Fi connect is very fast.
Android 10 .. Storage 32gb available 27gb .. Ram 2gb.
mid range smart TV ...in this CooCaa 43s6g pro TV is very good ..

i am happy .

Good one for the price.
I was looking for a 40 or 43 inch smart tv with below requirements
* Very low bezels
* Latest Android
* Good picture and reasonable sound
* Low thickness from wall
* All ott apps available

This tv satisfies all the above, works very well for a smallish room so that the 16 watt speakers are sufficient. It comes with low profile wall mount.
Bezels are very small looks good. Picture is also good.
Tv boot time is fast and apps are fast too. Happy with the purchase.

After three days of using the tv, I would say for 20k worth buying. I have also taken the additional warranty offered by flipkart, which gives extra support to the customer. Delivery was promt and got the tv fixed on the same day itself. Even though it says 16w speakers sound clarity is really good. 4k movies are awesome. Remote is really handy to use and doesn't looks flimsy. Built of the tv is strong and feels premium. Overall if you are planning to buy a tv for 20k just go for it.

Colour production is brilliant in this tv, It beats most of the high end models...
4k videos at 60fps play flawlessly...
Sound is clear but lacks a little bass(Still sufficient for larger rooms as it is loud, Supports Dolby)...
Connectivity is good(Bluetooth 5.0)...

If you are looking for budget friendly 4k tv go for it as it beats all other LOW & MID end models in both QUALITY AND PRICE...

It's a very good TV in this price range. Very good picture quality and sufficient sound output. The only thing which is wrong is that this TV does not support 5GHz Wi-Fi. The specifications on this site mention that it supports dual band Wi-Fi, which is very misleading. I could have returned the TV just for this reason. Flipkart should make the changes in the specifications.

WOW SIMPLE BEST ONE OF THE BEST 4K TV. RUNNING NETFLIX WITH 4K. IT HAS WIDEVINE L1 SUPPORT. HAS EVERYTHING WHICH THE LEADING TV OFFER.

AND THE SOUND QUALITY IS ALSO GOODS.

Great tv at very low cost it help my children in study.Display has great quality experience no one give so many ram rom in this price. I bought it at 20499 great value. No brand provide such a great quality tv in this price in India. Loot loot

Quality of picture is good. But Chromecast shows slowness. Bluetooth works fine. No zoom facility in picture to view small size videos. No audio out , but has only optical audio out. No headset connectivity port. OK TV.

In such low price the UHD TV is overall good but not best. Expect speaker to be at least 20W.

Its My third Android TV after Marq and TCL.
I habe purchased 43" TV and I am giving review after using it for almost 2 days.

PROS :-
(1) Display is crystal clear and crispy, colour enhancement is just awesome. You can watch HD videos and ultra HD (4K) video on it and you will fall in love.

(2) Design of this TV is just beautiful. It has really low bezels which give your TV viewing just stunning.

(3) Sound quality is very good, TV has 16 watt speakers which is more than sufficient for a big bedroom or a hall.
Dolby Atmos and Tru Surround Sound system working perfectly on this TV. You can turn your TV into home theatre by using Dolby Atmos.

(4) Android OS 10 makes your TV smooth like butter. You can use any app, play any type of videos without a single glitch.

(5) Boot time is real fast in this TV. Just plug and play.

(6) Value for money. I have searched for almost 10 days and I found COOCAA TV the best among all the brands in this price range. This is the cheapest 4K smart TV in the market.


CONS -

(1) Display brightness is too bright which can cause a little watery eyes. You should adjust the viewing distance.

(2) Remote is old style and its too big. Remote is unnecessarily big.

Thats All Guys. Over all its the best in market purchase. You can compare yourself and I guarantee you won't find anything best than that.
Best picture quality, as well as good sound quality. No need of any extra speakers in a room. Best in this price segment.

I have a 55" 4K VU TV and had a 40 Inch Mitachi FHD TV, I just exchanged the 40" TV to get a 4K TV and I am very much satisfied.
I find the AI 4K picture quality much better than the VU 4K I have.
The sound output is better than my old 20W speaker TV, more than enough loud and I am very much satisfied.
No Distortion and the dialogues can be heard pretty clear.
It downloaded .98 GB of an update on the first day.
All the specifications are far better than any other TV at a similar price range.

If you would like to use the Firestick remote for controlling the TV, you will have to select Skyworth TV in the options as you will not find Coocaa listed there.
I recommend opting for the 3-year warranty by Flipkart as this is a new launch in India and we never know.

I have seen some intermittent internet disconnectivity the first day but looks like it is auto fixed.
The installation was delayed due to Diwali. Definitely a good choice as a second TV.

Ordered on 8th May 2021, Received the Product on 9th May 2021 and the installation was completed on same day. Thanks Flipkart and Jeeves for the fast Delivery and installation.

The Installation team (Jeeves) was friendly and helpful. Product is awesome and has a zing look to it. I missed taking the additional 2 year warranty from Flipkart during the ordering process and the same was offered by Jeeves at a little bit extra. Bezels are thin on 3 sides but yeah still visible, UI is fast and responsive.

Will add to the review after a couple of months.

4K TV at this price range is awesome. Great video and audio quality. No issues with connectivity (need to install app for casting,). Remote is very good and Google assistant works like a charm. Definite yes over other HD TVs at this price range. Better to choose additional warranty from Flipkart, just in case.

A highly satisfying product as seen over the last 10 days. It delivers in picture & sound quality as it promises. So no issues; thats why it deserves 5* rating.
Were it supported with an elaborate users manual, printed or online, would make it less time consuming to Learn the usage for full functionality. The product brochure enclosed, or the one in the TV menu, are extremely cryptic/ deficient in operating instructions. For example : even after spending much time, I hv not been able to find mode for converting screen aspect from 16:9 to 4:3.
Overall, it is value for money with the best specs in this category at the most economical price.

Worth every penny you send!

Picture quality: is amazing. 4K HDR videos look gorgeous. 43 inch size is well suited for medium size rooms. The best feature of the tv for the price you pay.

Hardware: absolute value for money. 2gb RAM, 32GB storage is boon. Can install lot of stuff. Games as well. Built is all round plastic though. Stand is plastic. Can't expect premium build for the price. Bezels are thin though so you will enjoy watching movies in this. Sound is 16 watt which is obviously low. Again can't expect more for the price, in the price range maximum you can get us 20 watts so not a negative for the TV. Chrome cast works like a charm, you can cast from phone, laptop, tab, smooth casting. Prime, Netflix, YouTube work as usual, You get option to play 4K video. You get decent controls to change sound, picture quality in the menu. TV is bright and doesn't feel low on brightness. All ports work nicely, you get one port with HDMI arc support, it is not eARC though. Google assistant work fine.

Software: android 10 does the job well. In built OS can play majority of file types from external hard drive and pen drives. For some formats which it can't play just install 3rd party app from playstore.

Remote: full size. No minimal design, but get all the controls. It's a bluetooth and not optical so no need to point at the tv. You get Netflix, prime video, YouTube and Google Play dedicated buttons. Google assistant button is additional as well. I like this remote more than MI (my dad had Mi tv).
